about_the_game:
Time Flipper is an adventure / exploration game set in a hidden dimension, similar to Earth.

With the time-flip device, you can switch between two world states: the past and the future. This powerful tool will help you navigate the world, find hidden passages, items, and find the missing, those who have been abducted by alien entities. Free them and they’ll help you escape. Be careful though, there will be resistance.

Key Features

  • A place to discove on your own, no hand holding, filled with surprises, surrealism and things out of this world

  • A party of companions with different unique abilities

  • Engage in combat without using any weapons, protect yourself with the environment and find weapons for your companions to defend you.

  • Clear the path for your companions to follow you using your time-flip device.

With the press of one button, flip between timelines, back and forth, at anytime.

Work as a team to make way

The kidnappers won't let you go easily, their motives are not clear but their hostile actions are!

Switch between timelines to find your path, hidden objects, prisoners and many weird stuff. You know, typical Time Flipper stuff.

Time Flipper is an adventure / exploration game set in a hidden dimension, similar to Earth.

With the time-flip device, you can switch between two world states: the past and the future. This powerful tool will help you navigate the world, find hidden passages, items, and find the missing, those who have been abducted by alien entities. Free them and they’ll help you escape. Be careful though, there will be resistance.

Key Features

  • A place to discove on your own, no hand holding, filled with surprises, surrealism and things out of this world

  • A party of companions with different unique abilities

  • Engage in combat without using any weapons, protect yourself with the environment and find weapons for your companions to defend you.

  • Clear the path for your companions to follow you using your time-flip device.

With the press of one button, flip between timelines, back and forth, at anytime.

Work as a team to make way

The kidnappers won't let you go easily, their motives are not clear but their hostile actions are!

Switch between timelines to find your path, hidden objects, prisoners and many weird stuff. You know, typical Time Flipper stuff.
name: Time Flipper Demo
short_description: Press one button to switch between timelines, this is your time-flip device, use it to find the missing people and convince them to follow you. Lead them out by switching the world state. Enemies will attack you but you carry no weapons, escape the violence by switching between timelines.
